I agree
thank you for supporting the DE4L research project, aimed at building a data corpus of german street and bike-lanes, which will support solutions for more cyclist friendly traffic infrastructure in cities.
Regarding your privacy see our privacy agreement. i tracked length Waypoint Waypoints your contribution: Hello first fragment Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s PrivacyAgreementActivity close cancel proceed
This app collects location data to assign sensor data to a given point in space-time even when the app is closed or not in use, as long as you are in record mode. Without the exact location, the measurements would be just random noise, unsuitable for this research project.
